bio:
Molgrom Twice-Killed is a Nord thief and a member of the Thieves Guild in Riften.
He is currently imprisoned in the Riften Jail, apparently because he is prone to killing marks rather than sneaking around while on jobs. He called himself "Twice-Killed" after another thief almost killed him when he insulted him, despite the fact that he wasn't even killed once. He claims it "has a better ring to it."
name: Molgrom Twice-Killed
